advancements.mobtalismans.endermite_scal: Gently collect a scale from an Endermite.
advancements.mobtalismans.root.descripti: Discover the power of Mob Talismans.
advancements.mobtalismans.root.title: Mob Talismans
advancements.mobtalismans.silverfish_sca: Politely ask a Silverfish for one of its scales.
config.mobtalismans.conduit_talisman.dam: How often (in ticks) the talisman deals damage to nearby hostile aquatic mobs.
How much damage the talisman deals to nearby hostile aquatic mobs each interval. 1 = half a heart.
config.mobtalismans.conduit_talisman.dur: How many times the talisman can deal damage before breaking. Set to 0 for infinite durability.
config.mobtalismans.conduit_talisman.ena: Whether the Conduit Talisman is enabled.
config.mobtalismans.conduit_talisman.rad: The radius around the wearer in which hostile aquatic mobs will be damaged.
config.mobtalismans.creeper_talisman.che: How often (in ticks) the talisman checks for creepers nearby.
config.mobtalismans.creeper_talisman.dur: How many creepers the talisman can protect against before breaking. Set to 0 for infinite durability.
config.mobtalismans.creeper_talisman.ena: Whether the Creeper Talisman is enabled.
config.mobtalismans.creeper_talisman.rad: The radius around the wearer in which creepers will not deal block damage when they explode.
config.mobtalismans.enderman_talisman.ch: How often (in ticks) the talisman checks for endermen nearby.
config.mobtalismans.enderman_talisman.du: How many endermen the talisman can protect against before breaking. Set to 0 for infinite durability.
config.mobtalismans.enderman_talisman.en: Whether the Enderman Talisman is enabled.
config.mobtalismans.enderman_talisman.ra: The radius around the wearer in which endermen will be prevented from picking up or placing blocks.
config.mobtalismans.phantom_talisman.dur: How many Phantom swoops can be blocked before the talisman breaks. Set to 0 for infinite durability.
config.mobtalismans.phantom_talisman.ena: Whether the Phantom Talisman is enabled.
How often (in ticks) the talisman checks for infested blocks nearby.
How many blocks the talisman can convert before breaking. Set to 0 for infinite durability.
Whether the Silverfish Talisman is enabled.
The radius around the wearer in which infested blocks will be converted.
